articles.author: Alexander McNamara
articles.title: Science news this week: Asia's tallest tree and mysterious brain spirals - Livescience.com
articles.description: June 24, 2023: Our weekly roundup of the latest science in the news, as well as a few fascinating articles to keep you entertained over the weekend.
articles.content: The news this week was dominated by the search for the OceanGate Titan submersible, which went missing during its descent to the wreckage of the Titanic. Tragically, the U.S. Coast Guard confirmed th… [+3783 chars]
